## Project overview

The purpose of this project is to gain insight into the standards-based legal representation
pilot taking place in Washington State. 

All the results and plots presented in the pages below should be
reproduceable by an individual with access to the data sources. Follow the
[Setup Instructions](setup.html) if you are interested in reproducing
the results for yourself.

After you have the [setup](setup.html) tasks completed, you will need to perform the following data wrangling tasks. 

1. [Import the data](data_import.html) 

2. [Wrangle the data](data_wrangling.html)

3. [Build treatment population](shelter_care_population.html)

4. [Build control population](shelter_care_population_control.html)
